mapper.insert: insert into member(m_email, m_password, m_nm, m_adyn, m_photo, loc_idx) values(#{m_email}, #{m_password},#{m_nm},#{m_adyn},#{m_photo},#{loc_idx})
mapper.select: select m_email from member where m_email = #{arg0}

SELECT count(*) from member
WHERE m_blacklist='Y'

SELECT m_idx, m_email, m_nm, m_photo, m_regdate, m_quitdate, m_blacklist, (select count(*) FROM member join report on member.m_idx=report.m_reported WHERE m_idx=#{arg0} ) as reportCount FROM member WHERE m_idx=#{arg0}
SELECT m_email, m_nm, m_photo, date_format(m_regdate,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') as m_regdate from dream.member where m_idx=#{m_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET m_quitdate=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE m_idx=#{arg0}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE tempcode=#{arg0} AND m_quitdate is null
